title: About Artem Zavyalov
description: Personal website and portfolio showcasing my work, skills, and experience. By day, I operate inside the system as a Senior Data Analyst at Delta School District #37, navigating data, reports, and hidden patterns. By night, I step outside the code as a curious DevOps developer, exploring projects ranging from natural phenomena and government solutions to websites, mobile apps, and ideas that bridge the digital and real worlds.

title: U2BER
description: Free online tool to convert YouTube videos to MP3, OGG, WAV, or download as video. Fast and easy-to-use audio extraction.

title: ZeroShadowDay
description: Interactive visualization showing when and where Zero Shadow Day occurs - a phenomenon when the sun is directly overhead.

title: ClearCast
description: CleanCast helps you wash your car at the perfect time by checking the local weather forecast. Instead of wasting a fresh wash before rain, CleanCast analyzes upcoming conditions to notify you when it's the best window to get your car cleaned. The app remembers your last wash, includes a 'dirty car' override, and will soon connect you with local car wash deals and discounts.

title: TrailAlert
description: Check ticket availability for popular parks in British Columbia. It monitors park pass availability and instantly notifies you when spots open up, giving hikers a better chance to book permits for high-demand trails.

title: SiteSense
description: Real-Time Construction Site Intelligence. Know exactly who's on construction site, which floor they're on, and which company they work for. Service is powered by BLE tags and LoRaWAN connectivity.

title: IPAddressChecker
description: A lightweight public service that returns your current public IP address in a simple, script-friendly format. It's designed for automation, monitoring, and quick checks, making it ideal for use in shell scripts, cron jobs, CI/CD pipelines, and curl requests. No tracking, no ads, just a fast and reliable way to get your IP.
